label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"鸡白痢","labels":["disease"]},{"start":22,"end":27,"text":"二类传染病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"寄生虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":35,"end":42,"text":"鸡白痢沙门氏菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":45,"end":50,"text":"传染性疾病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 鸡白痢（Pullorum disease），二类传染病、寄生虫病，是由鸡白痢沙门氏菌引起的传染性疾病，世界各地均有发生，是危害养鸡业最严重的疾病之一。

label: [{"start":15,"end":23,"text":"鸡白痢沙门氏杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":27,"end":30,"text":"排泄物","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 本病是一种极其常见的传染病，由鸡白痢沙门氏杆菌引起，其排泄物是重要的传播媒介，同时也可通过鸡蛋垂直传播。

label: [{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"不吃饲料","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"怕冷","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"身体蜷缩","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"翅膀下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"昏睡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":38,"end":46,"text":"排白色粘稠或淡黄","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"白色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"淡黄","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":47,"end":52,"text":"淡绿色稀便","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":47,"end":50,"text":"淡绿色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":53,"end":65,"text":"肛门有时被硬结的粪块封闭","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":66,"end":70,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"翅膀","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":51,"end":52,"text":"便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":53,"end":55,"text":"肛门","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":61,"end":63,"text":"粪块","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 主要症状和病变：雏鸡表现不吃饲料，怕冷，身体蜷缩，翅膀下垂，精神沉郁或昏睡，排白色粘稠或淡黄、淡绿色稀便，肛门有时被硬结的粪块封闭，呼吸困难。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"精神萎靡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":25,"end":35,"text":"排黄绿色或蛋清样稀便","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"黄绿色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":34,"end":35,"text":"便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":45,"end":49,"text":"脾脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":47,"end":49,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"脆弱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":53,"end":57,"text":"有坏死点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":58,"end":69,"text":"肾脏暗红充血或苍白贫血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":62,"end":64,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":60,"end":62,"text":"暗红","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":65,"end":67,"text":"苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":67,"end":69,"text":"贫血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":73,"end":78,"text":"腹膜炎变化","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":84,"end":88,"text":"卵巢萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":86,"end":88,"text":"萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":89,"end":93,"text":"卵子变性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":91,"end":93,"text":"变性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":96,"end":100,"text":"产蛋停止","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":79,"end":82,"text":"产蛋鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":94,"end":96,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"脾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":58,"end":60,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":73,"end":76,"text":"腹膜炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":84,"end":86,"text":"卵巢","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":89,"end":91,"text":"卵子","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 成年鸡无临床症状，少数感染严重的病鸡表现精神萎靡，排黄绿色或蛋清样稀便，主要病变可见肝脏、脾脏肿大、脆弱，有坏死点，肾脏暗红充血或苍白贫血，常出现腹膜炎变化。产蛋鸡可见卵巢萎缩，卵子变性，病鸡产蛋停止。

label: [{"start":9,"end":22,"text":"对种鸡场进行鸡白痢综合防治","labels":["control"]},{"start":23,"end":31,"text":"种鸡逐只检疫净化","labels":["control"]},{"start":33,"end":37,"text":"药物治疗","labels":["control"]},{"start":41,"end":46,"text":"作药敏试验","labels":["control"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"种鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":15,"end":18,"text":"鸡白痢","labels":["disease"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"种鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":50,"end":53,"text":"氟哌酸","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 防治：从种鸡入手，对种鸡场进行鸡白痢综合防治及种鸡逐只检疫净化；可药物治疗，最好先作药敏试验，一般用氟哌酸效果较好。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"成鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":67,"end":69,"text":"母鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"精神萎顿","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"缩头","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"翅下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":14,"end":22,"text":"拉白色浆糊状稀粪","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"白色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":23,"end":31,"text":"肛门常被粪便粘住","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":32,"end":37,"text":"排粪时发出","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":69,"end":76,"text":"产蛋量明显减少","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":61,"end":63,"text":"贫血","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":64,"end":66,"text":"下痢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":8,"end":9,"text":"头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":10,"end":11,"text":"翅","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":22,"text":"粪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"肛门","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":34,"text":"粪","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病雏精神萎顿，缩头，翅下垂，拉白色浆糊状稀粪，肛门常被粪便粘住，排粪时发出“吱、吱”叫声。成鸡多为隐性带菌，只有严重时见有贫血和下痢，母鸡产蛋量明显减少。

label: [{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"痢特灵","labels":["drug"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"拌匀喂鸡","labels":["control"]},{"start":31,"end":32,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 1、每公斤饲料加入痢特灵200-400毫克（即2-4片）拌匀喂鸡，连用7天，停3天，再喂7天。

label: [{"start":6,"end":7,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"土霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":15,"end":18,"text":"金霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"四环素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"喂服","labels":["control"]},{"start":65,"end":69,"text":"拌匀喂鸡","labels":["control"]},{"start":50,"end":53,"text":"土霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":68,"end":69,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 2、按每公斤鸡体重用土霉素（或金霉素、四环素）200毫克喂服（每片药含量250毫克）；或每公斤饲料加土霉素2-3克（即8-12片）拌匀喂鸡，连用3-4天。

label: [{"start":4,"end":5,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"青霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"拌料喂服","labels":["control"]}]
text: 3、每只鸡每天用青霉素2000国际单位拌料喂服，连用7天。

label: [{"start":44,"end":48,"text":"拌料喂鸡","labels":["control"]},{"start":69,"end":76,"text":"加入饮水中喂鸡","labels":["control"]},{"start":47,"end":48,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":75,"end":76,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"磺胺脒","labels":["drug"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"磺胺嘧啶","labels":["drug"]},{"start":29,"end":36,"text":"磺胺二甲基嘧啶","labels":["drug"]},{"start":57,"end":60,"text":"链霉素","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 4、每公斤饲料加入磺胺脒（或磺胺嘧啶）10克（即20片）或磺胺二甲基嘧啶5克（即10片）拌料喂鸡，连用5天；也可用链霉素按0.1-0.2%加入饮水中喂鸡，连用7天。

label: [{"start":2,"end":10,"text":"药物最好交替使用","labels":["control"]}]
text: 以上药物最好交替使用，以利提高疗效。

label: [{"start":19,"end":24,"text":"消化道感染","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 本病可经蛋垂直传播，也可通过接触传染，消化道感染是本病的主要传染方式。

label: [{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"青年鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 本病主要危害雏鸡、近年来青年鸡发病亦呈上升趋势。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"病死鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"脱水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"眼睛下陷","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"下陷","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":23,"text":"脚趾干枯肝肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"干枯","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":45,"text":"肝脏可见许多黄白色小坏死点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":41,"text":"黄白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":52,"text":"卵黄吸收不良","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":54,"end":59,"text":"黄绿色液化","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":54,"end":57,"text":"黄绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":61,"end":76,"text":"未吸收的卵黄干枯呈棕黄色奶酪样","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":70,"end":73,"text":"棕黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"眼睛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"脚趾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":21,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"卵黄","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":48,"end":52,"text":"吸收不良","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":67,"end":69,"text":"干枯","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":65,"end":67,"text":"卵黄","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":41,"end":45,"text":"小坏死点","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 1.雏鸡:病死鸡脱水,眼睛下陷,脚趾干枯肝肿大、充血，较大雏鸡的肝脏可见许多黄白色小坏死点。卵黄吸收不良，呈黄绿色液化，或未吸收的卵黄干枯呈棕黄色奶酪样。

label: [{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"白痢结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":25,"text":"肺内有黄白色大小不等到的坏死灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":16,"text":"黄白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":11,"text":"肺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":1,"end":7,"text":"灰褐色肝样变","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":1,"end":4,"text":"灰褐色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":4,"end":5,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"肺炎","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 有灰褐色肝样变肺炎，肺内有黄白色大小不等到的坏死灶（白痢结节）。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"盲肠膨大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"膨大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":14,"text":"肠内有奶酪样凝结物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":45,"text":"部位可见隆起的白色白痢结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"盲肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":5,"end":6,"text":"肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"心肌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"肌胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"肠管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":8,"end":14,"text":"奶酪样凝结物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":45,"text":"白痢结节","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 盲肠膨大，肠内有奶酪样凝结物。病程较长时，在心肌、肌胃、肠管等到部位可见隆起的白色白痢结节。

label: [{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"育成鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":6,"end":12,"text":"肝脏显著肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"质脆易碎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"被膜下散","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"下散","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":29,"text":"密布出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":36,"text":"灰白色坏死灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"灰白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":51,"text":"心脏可见肿瘤样黄白色白痢结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":47,"text":"黄白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":57,"end":61,"text":"心脏变形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":62,"end":66,"text":"白痢结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":70,"end":72,"text":"肌胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":73,"end":75,"text":"肠管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":76,"end":80,"text":"脾脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":78,"end":80,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":81,"end":85,"text":"质脆易碎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":76,"end":78,"text":"脾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"被膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"心脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":57,"end":59,"text":"心脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":51,"text":"白痢结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":59,"end":61,"text":"变形","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 2.育成鸡:肝脏显著肿大,质脆易碎,被膜下散在或密布出血点或灰白色坏死灶.心脏可见肿瘤样黄白色白痢结节,严重时可见心脏变形.白痢结节也可见于肌胃和肠管。脾脏肿大,质脆易碎。

label: [{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"感染鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":29,"end":32,"text":"卵巢炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"卵泡萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"变形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"变色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":50,"text":"呈三角形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":53,"text":"梨形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":54,"end":58,"text":"不规则形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":59,"end":63,"text":"呈黄绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":64,"end":66,"text":"灰色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":67,"end":70,"text":"黄灰色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":71,"end":74,"text":"灰黑色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":82,"end":90,"text":"卵泡内容物呈水样","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":91,"end":93,"text":"油状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":94,"end":97,"text":"干酪样","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":88,"end":90,"text":"水样","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"卵泡","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":82,"end":87,"text":"卵泡内容物","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 3.成年鸡：无症状感染鸡剖检时有肉眼可见病变，病鸡一般表现卵巢炎，可见卵泡萎缩、变形、变色，呈三角形、梨形、不规则形，呈黄绿色、灰色、黄灰色、灰黑色等异常色彩，有的卵泡内容物呈水样、油状或干酪样。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"卵巢","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"输卵管炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":19,"end":25,"text":"卵黄性腹膜炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":26,"end":31,"text":"输卵管阻塞","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"阻塞","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":37,"text":"输卵管膨大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"膨大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":44,"text":"内有凝卵样物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":48,"end":52,"text":"辜丸发炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":53,"end":59,"text":"睾丸萎缩变硬","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":60,"end":62,"text":"变小","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":55,"end":57,"text":"萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":57,"end":59,"text":"变硬","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"发炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":48,"text":"病公鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"输卵管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":35,"text":"输卵管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"辜丸","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":53,"end":55,"text":"睾丸","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 由于卵巢的变化与输卵管炎的影响，常形成卵黄性腹膜炎，输卵管阻塞，输卵管膨大。内有凝卵样物。病公鸡辜丸发炎，睾丸萎缩变硬、变小。

label: [{"start":21,"end":29,"text":"局部组织坏死崩解","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"坏死崩解","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":53,"text":"成纤维细胞浸润增生","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":53,"text":"浸润增生","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"局部组织","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"淋巴细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":35,"end":38,"text":"浆细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":39,"end":43,"text":"异嗜细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":49,"text":"成纤维细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":60,"end":61,"text":"心","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":62,"end":63,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":64,"end":65,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":66,"end":67,"text":"肺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":68,"end":70,"text":"卵巢","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":57,"end":59,"text":"死鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"白痢结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":1,"end":6,"text":"肝脏坏死灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":1,"end":3,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 取肝脏坏死灶与白痢结节进行病理组织学检查:局部组织坏死崩解、淋巴细胞、浆细胞、异嗜细胞、成纤维细胞浸润增生。将病、死鸡的心、肝、脾、肺、卵巢等器定局定局官采集的病料，接种于普通琼脂培养基进行细菌学诊断。

label: [{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"鸡血","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 24小时后，可长出边缘整齐、表面光滑、湿润闪光、灰白色半透明、直径为1厘米的小菌落。取待检鸡血与诊断抗原进行平板凝集试验。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"弱雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"脐部发炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"发炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"脐部","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 1．雏鸡：孵出的鸡苗弱雏较多，脐部发炎，2-3日龄开始发病、死亡,7—I0日龄达死亡高峰,2周后死亡渐少。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":4,"end":8,"text":"精神不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"怕冷","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"寒战","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"羽毛逆立","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"食欲废绝","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":25,"end":32,"text":"排白色粘稠粪便","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"白色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":47,"text":"肛门周围羽毛有石灰样粪便粘污","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":50,"end":54,"text":"堵塞肛门","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"肛门","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":52,"end":54,"text":"肛门","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病雏表现精神不振、怕冷、寒战。羽毛逆立，食欲废绝。排白色粘稠粪便，肛门周围羽毛有石灰样粪便粘污，甚至堵塞肛门。

label: [{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":25,"end":31,"text":"伸颈张口呼吸","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":51,"end":55,"text":"生长缓慢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":56,"end":58,"text":"消瘦","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":59,"end":63,"text":"腹部膨大","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":61,"end":63,"text":"膨大","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"肺炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"患病鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":64,"end":66,"text":"病雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":70,"end":73,"text":"关节炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":74,"end":78,"text":"关节肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":76,"end":78,"text":"肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":79,"end":81,"text":"跛行","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":82,"end":86,"text":"原地不动","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"气管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":27,"text":"颈","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":29,"text":"口","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":48,"end":51,"text":"耐过鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":59,"end":61,"text":"腹部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":74,"end":76,"text":"关节","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 有的不见下痢症状,因肺炎病变而出现呼吸困难,气管,伸颈张口呼吸。患病鸡群死亡率为10%—25%,耐过鸡生长缓慢,消瘦,腹部膨大。病雏有时表现关节炎、关节肿胀、跛行或原地不动。

label: [{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"育成鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":19,"end":20,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"病雏","labels":["type"]}]
text: 2.育成鸡:主要发生于40—80日龄的鸡,病鸡多为病雏未彻底治愈,转为慢性,或育雏期感染所致。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":16,"end":17,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":21,"end":22,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"精神不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"食欲差","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"下痢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"突然死亡","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 鸡群中不断出现精神不振、食欲差的鸡和下痢的鸡，病鸡常突然死亡，死亡持续不断，可延续20-30天。

label: [{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":6,"end":9,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":22,"end":27,"text":"无症状感染","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":42,"end":55,"text":"受精率和孵化率均处于低水平","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":56,"end":57,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 3.成年鸡:成年鸡不表现急性感染的特征,常为无症状感染.病菌污染较重的鸡群,产蛋率、受精率和孵化率均处于低水平。鸡的死淘率明显高于正常鸡群。

label: [{"start":3,"end":9,"text":"检疫净化鸡群","labels":["control"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"带菌种鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":72,"end":73,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: (1)检疫净化鸡群：通过血清学试验，检出并淘汰带菌种鸡，次检查于60—7D日龄进行，第二次检查可在16周龄时进行，后每隔1个月检查1次、发现阳性鸡及时淘汰，直至全群的阳性率不超过0.5%为止。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"严格消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":55,"end":59,"text":"福尔马林","labels":["drug"]},{"start":59,"end":63,"text":"熏蒸消毒","labels":["control"]}]
text: (2)严格消毒：种蛋消毒。及时拣、选种蛋，并分别于拣蛋、入孵化器后、18—19日胚龄落盘时3次用28毫升/米3福尔马林熏蒸消毒20分钟。

label: [{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"福尔马林","labels":["drug"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"熏蒸消毒","labels":["control"]}]
text: 出雏达50%左右时，在出雏器内用10毫升/米3福尔马林再次熏蒸消毒。

label: [{"start":0,"end":12,"text":"孵化室建立严格的消毒制度","labels":["control"]},{"start":43,"end":47,"text":"清洁消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":54,"end":58,"text":"带鸡消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":55,"end":56,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 孵化室建立严格的消毒制度。育雏舍、育成舍和蛋鸡舍做好地面、用具、饲槽、笼具、饮水器等的清洁消毒定期对鸡群进行带鸡消毒。

label: [{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"加强维鸡饲养管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"药物预防","labels":["control"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"维鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":43,"end":46,"text":"痢特灵","labels":["drug"]},{"start":53,"end":56,"text":"氟哌酸","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 加强维鸡饲养管理，注意 药物预防。在本病流行地区，育雏时可在饲料中交替添加0.04%的痢特灵、0.005%氟哌酸进行预防。

label: [{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"小鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"花椒","labels":["drug"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"蜂蜜","labels":["drug"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"大黄","labels":["drug"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"甘草","labels":["drug"]},{"start":81,"end":86,"text":"每天鸡服用","labels":["control"]},{"start":83,"end":84,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 治疗：花椒15g，蜂蜜30g，大黄、甘草各6g，加水200ml，煎汁100ml和面粉做成 小丸，每只小鸡1d喂3次，每次1-3丸。也可煎汁两次，浓缩汁为30ml，每天鸡服用3-5滴，或稀释3倍自饮。
